snippet.title: 60 Seconds! Nintendo Switch Trailer - EU
snippet.description:
Oh no! It's the nuclear bomb alarm!

Available NOW on Nintendo Switch™ - https://www.nintendo.com/games/detail/60-seconds-switch

60 Seconds! is a dark comedy atomic adventure of scavenge and survival. Collect supplies and rescue your family before the nuke hits. Stay alive in your fallout shelter. Make difficult decisions, ration food and hunt mutant cockroaches. And maybe survive. Or not.

60 Seconds!
OFFICIAL WEBSITE ► http://www.60secondsgame.com
OFFICIAL FACEBOOK ► https://www.facebook.com/RG60seconds

Here be robots!
STUDIO WEBSITE ► http://www.robotgentleman.com
STUDIO TWITTER ► http://www.facebook.com/robotgentleman
STUDIO FACEBOOK ► http://www.twitter.com/robotgentleman
STUDIO DISCORD ► https://discord.gg/8pwVJu6

Our friends - Black Moon Design
► http://blackmoondevgames.com/

Cast:
Ted McDoodle: Robert Podgórski
Narrator: Duffy Weber
Sock: as itself



Credits:
Production: Robot Gentleman
Dir: Juliusz Zenkner
DoP: Kacper Fertacz
Puppeteer: Anastazja Kulińska
Costumes: Anastazja Kulińska, Juliusz Zenkner
Writing: Dominik Gotojuch

Editing: Kacper Fertacz
Postproduction: Juliusz Zenkner

Music: Michał Ratkowski

Special Thanks: 
Zuzanna Plisz 
Michał Mielcarek
Kuba Sobek
Kafel Pieniążek & Vader for not destroying the set
